src_original: dvātriṃśadbhi kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo ityucyate /  katame dvātriṃśadbhiḥ yaduta hitasukhādhyāśayatayā sarvasattveṣu /
tgt_original: 菩薩成就三十二法故名為菩薩，助益樂深心故。

src_original: sarvajñajñānāvatāraṇatayā kim ahammargāmīti pareṣāṃ jñānākunsanatā niradhimānatayā /
tgt_original: 於一切眾生令入一切智智，稱己智滅慢故；
不作恩愛，怨及非怨等心故，永親故，盡至涅槃；

src_original: KP.24 anṛtavākyatā smitamukhapūrvābhibhāṣaṇatā nupādatteṣu bhāreṣv . v. ṣ. d.
tgt_original: 美言悅目先應故； 不斷彼心故；

src_original: n........... sarvasattveṣvaparicinnamahākaruṇatā aparikhinnamānasatayā saddharmaparyeṣṭim ārabhyātṛ....... śrutārthatayā /
tgt_original: 所許之事不休息，不疲倦意故； 聞義無厭足故；
自過見患故； 見他作過不說故；
一切威儀行菩薩心業故；

src_original: vipākāpratikāṅkṣiṇa tyāgaḥ sarvabhavagatyupapa........ niḥśritaṃ śīlam /  sarvasattveṣvapratihata kṣāntiḥ  KP.25 sarvakuśalamūlasamādānanāya vīryaṃ /  ārūpya........ parikarṣitaṃ dhyānām /
